attributes.action: follow the advice of the Policy Exchange and start charging drunks who turn up at NHS A & E departments for their treatment OR they don't get treated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just think how many more MPs would be able to buy houses for their ducks with the HUGE amounts of money this policy would haul in, AND, the taxpayer really wouldn't have an axe to grind because they would no longer be funding NHS treatment for self inflicted problems/injuries.  People want to get drunk then they (or the manufacturers of the booze they drink) should pay for any use of NHS resources used as a consequence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
